info.title: Eventbrite Venue API
info.description: The API for managing Eventbrite venues.

post.summary: Creates a new venue and returns it as an object.
post.description: Creates a new venue and returns it as an object.

parameters.name: venue.address.address_1
parameters.description: The first line of the address

parameters.name: venue.address.address_2
parameters.description: The second line of the address

parameters.name: venue.address.city
parameters.description: The city where the venue is

parameters.name: venue.address.country
parameters.description: The country where the venue is

parameters.name: venue.address.latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the coordinates for the venue

parameters.name: venue.address.longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the coordinates for the venue

parameters.name: venue.address.postal_code
parameters.description: The postal_code where the venue is

parameters.name: venue.address.region
parameters.description: The region where the venue is
